channel.title: How would i make a certain name use mod rights in here
channel.description:
how would i make it to where a certain players name will be able to use any mod commands here
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);

item.title: How would i make a certain name use mod rights in here
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Bryanc:

What? It’s just a name to show how it works.

I know,
but I remember skyping with him and playing hydra or heroscape
Good old times,

item.title: How would i make a certain name use mod rights in here
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“pastaway, post:1, topic:420856”]how would i make it to where a certain players name will be able to use any mod commands here

[quote]
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);[/quote][/quote]
Look at your other commands, when it says something like exception.player(“Example”)
Rip that code :3
